Method Detail

findRules

@RequestMapping(value="/ajax/findRules",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public List<String> findRules(@RequestParam
                                                          Long grammarId,
                                                          @RequestParam
                                                          String searchText)
Finds rules. Provides functionality for insert ruleref feature.

Parameters:
grammarId - ID of grammar.
searchText - Search text.
Returns:
JSON formated collection of strings.

validateXml

@RequestMapping(value="/ajax/validateXml",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public String validateXml(@RequestParam
                                                      String content)
Validates posted XML and return String AJAX response.

Parameters:
content - XML string to validate.
Returns:
True if is content is valid, otherwise returns validation error.
